name: Control Freak (itch) (radian628)
description:
pain and suffering.

The theme for this 24h game jam was "Too many Controls", so we made a tower defense game where you manually assign keybindings and control each tower you place. Homes collect resources, which you can spend to buy more homes or towers. 

Don't let the little UFO dudes destroy all your houses! You'll lose the game!

CONTROLS:

  • Move your mouse to the sides of the screen to pan around the world.
  • Scroll up and down to zoom in and out.
  • Right click to open the build menu.
  • Hold down a key or key combo and click on Tower (from the build menu) to build a tower.
  • Press a key or key combo to fire from the associated tower.
  • Towers aim at the mouse.
This is a worker's home. Place homes near resources to collect money from them. You need money to build towers and more homes! This is what a resource looks like! Place homes near them to collect resources and make money! This is a tower. To place one, right click to open the placing menu, hold a key (or combo) down, and click tower. You now control the tower with the keybind you just pressed.This is the little ufo dudes you have to watch out for. Shoot them down with your towers and don't let them destroy your homes!
